snippet.title: MDK playthrough - Level 1
snippet.description: MDK - one of my all-time favorites titles for the PC. Games just don't get any better than this... I still play this game from time to time, and it has aged very well, it hasn1t lost anything from it's charm. Addicting gameplay, incredible graphics for its time coupled with superb music and audio and originality! This is going to be a full playthrough, here is the first level for starters, I will be making a playthrough for every single level in this game!
